name.vi: Lông vũ của sức mạnh ma thuật

description.en: A magic tool made by Lillip from a Luia feather. It can double magic power.
description.ar: A magic tool made by Lillip from a Luia feather. It can double magic power.
description.br: Uma ferramenta mágica feita por Lillip a partir de uma pena de Luia. Pode dobrar o poder mágico.
description.cns: 英雄战争时，使用特殊羽毛制成的魔法道具，增加双倍魔法力量。
description.de: (Jobquestitem) Dieses Magiewerkzeug wurde von Lillip hergestellt, die eine Luia Feder dafür verwendete. Es steigert die magische Kraft.
description.fi: A magic tool made by Lillip from a Luia feather. It can double magic power.
description.fil: A magic tool made by Lillip from a Luia feather. It can double magic power.
description.fr: objet incroyable augmentant la puissance magique, créé par Lillip à partir des plumes de Luia
description.id: Alat ajaib yang dibuat oleh Lilip dari bulu Luia. Dapat menggandakan kekuatan sihir.
description.it: A magic tool made by Lillip from a Luia feather. It can double magic power.
description.jp: 英雄戦争中、リルリップがルイアの羽で作った魔力増幅術具。魔力を200%上昇させると伝えられている。リルリップはこの羽の加護により、古代の上位精霊と盟約を結び、星々とも語ったといわれている。
description.kr: 영웅전쟁 중 매그미언투 전투 당시, 릴립이 루이아의 깃털로 제작한 신비한 마법 도구. 마력의 약 200%를 상승시키는 능력이 있다고 전해진다.
description.nl: A magic tool made by Lillip from a Luia feather. It can double magic power.
description.pl: A magic tool made by Lillip from a Luia feather. It can double magic power.
description.ru: Перо лавлина, заговоренное факиром Гэндальфи. Удваивает магическую силу владельца.
description.sp: Una herramienta mágica hecha por Lillip a partir de una pluma de Luia. Puede duplicar el poder mágico.
description.sw: A magic tool made by Lillip from a Luia feather. It can double magic power.
description.th: เครื่องมือวิเศษที่ทำโดย Lillip จากขนนก Luia สามารถเพิ่มพลังเวทย์มนตร์ได้สองเท่า
description.tw: 英雄戰爭時，黎利使用鳳凰羽毛製成的魔法道具。
description.vi: Một công cụ ma thuật do Lillip tạo ra từ một chiếc lông vũ Luia. Nó có thể tăng gấp đôi sức mạnh ma thuật.
